UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antioxidant peptidomics reveals novel skin antioxidant system.
Literature.Author: Yang H, Wang X, Liu X, Wu J, Liu C, Gong W, Zhao Z, Hong J, Lin D, Wang Y, Lai R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=60µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=15µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=120µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=30µg/ml)
